abstract: Reynold Levy, who stepped down last January, was given a $600,000 in 2013, his last year with the organization, according to recent tax filings.

headline.main: Lincoln Center President Received Increase in Bonus in Final Year

snippet: Reynold Levy, who stepped down last January, was given a $600,000 in 2013, his last year with the organization, according to recent tax filings.
